text:
@SpeakerPelosi BREAKING: 82% of the benefits of a tax change tucked in the must-pass coronavirus package will go to people earning more than $1 million/yr, new JCT report finds

Hedgefunds & real estate owners are main beneficiaries

Report requested by @SenWhitehouse

https://t.co/v64goiBZdC
